= Report Bugs =

To report a bug:
  # Go to [http://code.google.com/p/wha/issues/entry]
  # Enter a title/summary for the bug
  # Please write a simple short description, *especially* the most important data would be that *what scenario/steps* you took to create the bug so that it could be reproducible.
  # Attach a file or screen shot if you think might be useful or necessary
  # Please make the owner *Behrooz Nobakht* so that we could fast get to know it or at least put the above email in the *CC*
  # Change *priority* label if required.
